description: This file defines functions and setup code for creating an MCP agent in a software project. It imports various modules, sets up paths, initializes storage and knowledge base components, and provides functions to instantiate an agent with specific configurations and models.

methods.name: get_mcp_agent
methods.description: Creates and returns an Agent configured for MCP interactions, with setup for storage, knowledge base, and instructions.

methods.name: get_model_for_provider
methods.description: Creates and returns a model instance based on the provided model string, supporting multiple providers like OpenAI, Gemini, Anthropic, and Groq.
